name: Enchanted Lands
description: Home to the merry halflings of Rivervale and the wretched goblins of Runnyeye.

npcs.name: Camfred
utterances: What, what? I umm, I am just a halfling walking about my homeland. That's right!
Umm... I like the police a lot.
Eh! What's this all about? Away from here.
Two thumbs up for us lawful folk. Crime is bad!

npcs.name: Captain Gullyshank
utterances: Announce yourself!  Are you friend or foe?
Words of caution are all I can lend you, friend.  Our forces are spread far too thin to assist with anything other than defending what is left of our land.
Will you help us? The majority of our forces are mere deputies and are not experienced with real world adventuring.

Thank you for lending your support. I need important documents recovered from several unguarded locations. The first set is at the old Bogbottom Mill. Be careful: goblins took over the mill. They're not very bright, but they sure are nasty!

npcs.name: defiled farmer
utterances: Destroy the invaders!
Free me!
The Reavers will come for you!
I must obey.
I must do as the Overfiend wills!

npcs.name: Kelbri Mossborn
utterances: Greetings, traveler. Have you come from the far off lands?

npcs.name: Sir Tatters
utterances: Greetings, traveler! As sole defender of this humble village, I welcome you.

Have you lost your mind to the mists! I admit we are a small village. So many of the meek have fallen prey to the evil denizens, plucked away while I slumbered! I am amazed that you even breached the wall of evil that surrounds us. But you are here now, but have no fear, Sir Tatters will not let this village fall to evil! Never!
I appreciate the offer, traveler, but the defense of this village is my duty charged to me by the call of the creator. If you seek to help, you can aid me.

As you can see, there are few people left for me to protect and since the demise of the creator, no one has been around to direct the engineering of new village walls to keep the evil denizens from entering and devouring the remaining populace.

I am the chosen defender of the people! The creator did not stuff you full of straw and slap a pumpkin on your neck! No, no, no. I need you to infiltrate the land of our enemy and lessen their threat. That is your duty.

npcs.name: a stable master
utterances: Greetings traveler, how can I assist you today?
